name: test_e2e_with_logs[344_CMD_NEST_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_NEST_002` |
| **Name** | Nested backtick in dollar-paren |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | nested_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details
